answers.answer: Problems with eyesight can be a symptom of pre eclampsia, not to worry u but u should get your blood pressure checked out to make sure its not suddenly risen.
Yes it can effect your baby if u don't go get checked abd taken care of!

Baby could also be sitting on your optic nerve. My hubby did that to his mom. She had to get coke bottle lens glasses pregnant with him and has had perfect eyesight the rest if her life.But since vision changes can be a sign of PIH/preeclampsia/toxemia (whichever you wanna call it) I would call your Dr as soon as you can. If you do develop other symptoms (swelling of your hands and/or face, sudden weight gain, throbbing headache, etc) I would call labor and delivery or go to the hospital too get checked out. It can be very dangerous for you and baby left untreated.
I will make an appointment ASAP to go see my doctor thank you guys

question: I have noticed my eyes have been weird , I have been seeing flashing lights in my eyes , no other symptoms . Should I be worried ? Had anyone had this problem
title: Flashing lights in eyes
